experience.title: Co-Founder & Investor
experience.description: At AY Ventures, the driving force is to create a direct link between promising startups and potential investors. The team excels in orchestrating meetings between founders and investors, seamlessly facilitating connections that are often the lifeblood of startup success. Through virtual meetings and streamlined communication, AY Ventures ensures a smooth and efficient fundraising process for startups.Book a meeting with AY Ventures here- ğŸ“ 0803 507 4044We also provide other fundraising-related services, such as:- Pitch Deck- Presentation Design- Corporate Deck- Company Profile- Business Plan- Financial Modelling- Startup Valuation- Company Valuation- Market Research Report- Competitor Analysis- Detailed Project Report (DPR)- Startup India Registration- Startup India Certificate- DPIIT Startup Recognition- Startup India Seed Fund- Income Tax Exemption Registration- Income Tax Exemption Certificate- 80 IAC Registration- 80 IAC Certificate- UDYAM Registration- MSME Registration- UDYAM Certificate- MSME Certificate- Company Incorporation- Company Annual Compliances- AWS Credits- GCP Credits- Free Hosting- Incubation Support- Incubator Application- Acceleration Support- Accelerator Application- Equity Funding- VC Funding- Seed Funding- Angel Funding- Debt Funding- Term Loan / Business Loan- Overdraft Limit (OD)- Cash Credit (CC)- Secured Loan / LAP- Venture Debt- Revenue Based Finance- Revenue Based Funding- Private Equity- Grant Funding- Grant Schemes- Angel Investor Database- Grants Database- Incubator Database- Accelerator Database- Family Offices- Mentorship for Early Stage Startups
